name: Kinshuk Kotal
position: Data Scientist @ Amex | Ellenox | IIT KGP | NUS
about: Interests in Artificial Intelligence, Optimization and Data Mining. Works on developing applications related to Natural language processing and Image processing. Also worked on image classification with tensorflow algorithms. Strong interest in solving complex problems through efficient algorithmic design

current_company.name: American Express
current_company.title: Data Scientist @ Amex | Ellenox | IIT KGP | NUS

experience.title: Startup Scout
experience.description: Ellenox is a startup incubator and product lab focused on the Indian ecosystem. We're building a culture of lean innovation by helping early-stage startups get to revenue and scale.
experience.description_html: Ellenox is a startup incubator and product lab focused on the Indian ecosystem. We're building a culture of lean innovation by helping early-stage startups get to revenue and scale. <!---->

experience.title: Machine Learning Internship
experience.description: • Collaborated with Quality inspection, Software team and performed the requirement analysis, design and development in order to evaluate opportunities to leverage image processing to automate visual quality inspections process on incoming vehicle parts.• Developed a machine learning model in python, OpenCV using concept of Edge Detector, Image Moments, Vector Transformation, Histogram Matching and Convolution for real time defect detection.• Performed test analysis and deployed the machine learning model on Android platform developed using flutter.• Developed a python program for offline prediction using Google Automl output - int8 quantised grap file and label map file.
experience.description_html: • Collaborated with Quality inspection, Software team and performed the requirement analysis, design and development in order to evaluate opportunities to leverage image processing to automate visual quality inspections process on incoming vehicle parts.• Developed a machine learning model in python, OpenCV using concept of Edge Detector, Image Moments, Vector Transformation, Histogram Matching and Convolution for real time defect detection.• Performed test analysis and deployed the machine learning model on Android platform developed using flutter.• Developed a python program for offline prediction using Google Automl output - int8 quantised grap file and label map file.

experience.title: Summer Research Internship
experience.description: Project - 1Developed Video Synopsis algorithm to summarize the long duration video in short time for surveillance system. Used Mask - RCNN instance segmentation & object classification to extract the object of interest and superimpose on a stationary background.Project - 2Collaborated in the development of an App for Indoor Localization using wifi and Bluetooth beacons technology. Operated with Pedestrian dead reckoning, magnetic and barometric sensors for indoor tracking purposes. Developed a RESTfull API server running on an Express framework in Node.js to handle HTTP request's methods.
experience.description_html: Project - 1Developed Video Synopsis algorithm to summarize the long duration video in short time for surveillance system. Used Mask - RCNN instance segmentation & object classification to extract the object of interest and superimpose on a stationary background.Project - 2Collaborated in the development of an App for Indoor Localization using wifi and Bluetooth beacons technology. Operated with Pedestrian dead reckoning, magnetic and barometric sensors for indoor tracking purposes. Developed a RESTfull API server running on an Express framework in Node.js to handle HTTP request's methods.

experience.title: Product Design Internship
experience.description: • Designed a bin for valves of two-wheeler which reduced the rejection rate by 1% and optimized the cost of each bin by 40% • Automated the process of burr removal during steel cap insertion on crankpin which reduced the manpower to 50%
experience.description_html: • Designed a bin for valves of two-wheeler which reduced the rejection rate by 1% and optimized the cost of each bin by 40% • Automated the process of burr removal during steel cap insertion on crankpin which reduced the manpower to 50% <!---->
